description:
My place is close to a number of new restaurants opening up. Chimu Peruvian Chicken is FANTASTIC. Bushwick's Roberta's is a ten minute walk away. There are two subway lines within 3 blocks. 
This is my parents' guest suite when they come visit. You’ll love my place because of the comfy bed. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

This is a spacious guest apartment. My parents will stay here when they visit us. I've had the whole space redone. All the furniture is new, everything.

I am happy to provide information and tips, but guests should expect to have peace and quiet.

Great South American Food, as well as a growing number of artisanal vendors of all kinds. Bushwick studios are a quick walk away.

We have two subways each 5 minutes away.
name: Guest suite in owner-occupied private residence
review: Martins place was perfect.  Great location and a lot of space which is especially nice for the area.  Would definitely recommend!!
